## import packages
import pandas as pd

import h2o
from h2o.automl import H2OAutoML
source.44af6c11:
#load and split dataset into training and test folds
## prepare data
h2o.init()

h2o_train = h2o.import_file('../input/santander-customer-transaction-prediction-dataset/train.csv')
h2o_test = h2o.import_file('../input/santander-customer-transaction-prediction-dataset/test.csv')

h2o_train['target'] = h2o_train['target'].asfactor()
source.e45d0d30:
## run model
features = [x for x in h2o_train.columns if x not in ['ID_code', 'target']]
